resources.string: This will allow the app to track your location with limited accuracy, not all rewards will be available.
This will allow the app to accurately track you location, all rewards will be available.
GPS location settings are currently disabled on this device. To enable them for full functionality, you must go to the system settings.
GPS location settings are currently enabled on this device. For full functionality, it is recommended to leave this setting on. However, Battery will be saved without it.
Network location settings are currently disabled on this device. To enable them for increased functionality, you must go to the system settings.
Network location settings are currently enabled on this device. Leaving them enabled can save battery when tracking location.
